Invocation Name: get music home
des:
Get Music Home is the perfect skill to create your own and personal Music Playlist from Google Drive. It helps you to play your favorite music on your assistant without the hassle.

NO need to have a server
NO need to turn on a computer
NO need to turn on bluetooth
NO extra device needed
JUST need a voice assistant


How to setup "Get Music Home | Listen to your Own Music from Google Drive (unofficial)"?

>>>>>>> INSTRUCTIONS <<<<<<<

STEP 1. Enable the skill and link your Amazon account
STEP 2. Go to https://getmusichome.com with your favorite browser
STEP 3. Log in with your Amazon account
STEP 4. Share your Google Drive folder
STEP 5. Enjoy your own and personal music playlist by saying 'Alexa, open Get Music Home'

------------------------


How to use "Get Music Home | Listen to your Own Music from Google Drive (unofficial)"?

After following the instructions, you can say:
- "Alexa, open Get Music Home"
- "Alexa, start Get Music Home"
- "Alexa, launch Get Music Home"

By default, it will automatically play your own and personal music playlist for one hour until you say "Alexa, stop".


Why "Get Music Home | Listen to your Own Music from Google Drive (unofficial)" stops after one hour?

Without any subscription to our premium membership, the skill will automatically stop after one hour and you need to relaunch the skill to continue listening to the playlist.

>>>>>>> PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP FEATURE <<<<<<<
With Get Music Home Plus, you can listen to your playlist without any limit.


How to set a timer?

First, you need to play the sound using one of the above method. Then, you can limit the time the sound will play by saying "Alexa, stop playing in 1 hour" (or however long you want it to last). Once 1 hour has passed, the sound will stop playing.
